Boundary crossing detected in zone zone_SFO12-4a at Staircase-002 on floor 4 of building SF012. Recommended actions include reviewing camera footage, analyzing location data, and initiating security alerts if necessary. Additional resources include URLs for Meraki camera footage and Cisco Spaces analytics.

recommended_actions: Review the camera footage for the last 10 minutes using the provided Meraki Camera URL.
Use the Cisco Spaces URL to analyze real-time location data and 3D maps to track movement in the building.
If the boundary crossing is unauthorized, trigger an alert to the security team and initiate lockdown procedures.
Asset tracking can be used to identify if any assets were moved during the boundary crossing.
Use the Cisco Spaces API to retrieve historical data for the past 30 days to identify patterns and trends in movement.
extra_notes: Cisco Spaces provides real-time location analytics and 3D maps of the building.
Meraki cameras offer real-time footage of the area.
Splunk integration collects data from Cisco Spaces and Meraki cameras.
